SEARCH
Package controller

Class PhotoScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoScreenController
public class PhotoScreenController extends Object
Controller for managing the photo screen of the photo album application. This controller is responsible for displaying photo details, adding tags, handling photo navigation, and other related functionalities.
